short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the real URL of links in a floating window on hover.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with URL Detail, a powerful browser extension that provides you with detailed insights into the links you hover over. In an internet filled with shortened URLs and potentially misleading links, URL Detail acts as your first line of defense against phishing, scam sites, and unwanted content by revealing the actual URL behind links. With URL Detail, you can:

Preview URLs before clicking to ensure they lead to expected sites.
Whitelist domains to streamline your browsing on trusted sites.
Customize settings to tailor the extension's functionality according to your preferences.
Stay informed about the destination of links without disrupting your browsing flow.

Ideal for cautious internet users, digital marketers, and cybersecurity enthusiasts, URL Detail is a must-have tool in your digital toolkit.

1.0.1 - Improved performance and fixed minor bugs for a smoother user experience.
